parameters.text:
=I am creating a video programmatically using an API. I have already created the scenes, and your task is to find suitable background music for the video, write a keyword-rich description that scores at least 90% in SEO analysis, and provide relevant hashtags based on the video content so that YouTube's algorithms promote it effectively.  I expect you to deliver everything professionally.

<VideoScenes>
{{ $json.output.scenes.map(item => item.text).map(item => `<VideoScene>${item}</VideoScene>`).join('\n') }}
</VideoScenes>

<MusicTags>
{{ $('Group the music tags1').item.json.data.map(item => `<MusicTag>${item}</MusicTag>`).join('\n') }}
</MusicTags>

I am creating a video programmatically using an API.
The API requires scenes to work with.
Each scene requires the following:
Text that will be converted into audio using AI technology.
Two to three keywords to search for background videos from Pexels.
Your Task:
Create a short video of 6-scenes about any psychological, mental, manipulation, Self-Discovery, Dark Psychology, Root Cause, Social Intelligence, or other popular psychology-related topics.
These videos are for YouTube Shorts, so they should be fast-paced, engaging, and suspenseful.

The channel name is "PsyloMind" and the link https://www.youtube.com/@PsyloMind

Each scene should be unique, unusual, or shocking, and not repetitive in the channel, to keep viewers watching and not skipping.
The topic must be new and not already created or covered before.
Style Guidelines:

The video should begin with one of the following hooks:
Protection Hook, Visual Hook, Paradox Hook, Interactive Hook, Actionable Hook, Self-Discovery Hook, Dark Psychology Hook, Challenge Hook, Root Cause Hook, Social Intelligence Hook.

Topic: Psychology, human behavior, social psychology, the intricacies of the human psyche, human nature, human personalities, human behavior patterns, types of mindsets, , Self-Discovery, Dark Psychology, Root Cause, Social Intelligence and other topics related to the channel's content and target audience.

Pace: The video should keep viewers engaged and prevent them from skipping to the end.

No Repetition: Choose a new, trending topic for each video.
Structure/Scenes:
Scene 1: A strong opening to grab attention immediately with a catchy hook.
Scenes 2-5:depending on the topic. Focus on providing valuable information that keeps the viewer engaged and prevents boredom.Keep the sentences punchy and avoid "filler" words.
Scene 6: A final thought-provoking statement that leaves the viewer thinking. Followed by a clear invitation: "Subscribe to PsyloMind to unlock the secrets of your mind. Like, comment your thoughts, and visit the channel for more deep dives."

Instructions:
"Now, keeping in mind that he will be using Adam's voice for the voiceover, create a complete script for a short video with 6 scenes using this format, optimized for  Psychology, human behavior, social psychology, the intricacies of the human psyche, human nature, human personalities, human behavior patterns, types of mindsets, , Self-Discovery, Dark Psychology, Root Cause, Social Intelligence and other topics related to the channel's content and target audience, ready for YouTube Shorts. Make it highly engaging, shareable, and intriguing."

=I am creating a video programmatically using an API.
The API requires scenes to work with.

Each scene requires the following:

Text that will be converted into audio using AI technology.

Two to three keywords to search for background videos from Pexels.

Your Task

Create a short video of 6-scenes about any psychological, mental, or manipulation topic, or other popular psychology-related topics.
These videos are for YouTube Shorts, so they should be fast-paced, engaging, and suspenseful.

The channel name is "PsyloMind".
Each scene should be unique, unusual, or shocking, and not repetitive, to make viewers say:
"Unbelievable... I want to know more!"

The topic must be new and not already created or covered before.

Style Guidelines

Many videos should start with catchy, psychologically intriguing phrases.

Tone: Curious, unusual, mysterious, psychological, mind-bending.

Topic: Psychology, human behavior, social psychology, the intricacies of the human psyche, human nature, human personalities, human behavior patterns, types of mindsets, and other topics related to the channel's content and target audience.

Pacing: Each scene should feel like a "mini-discovery" that builds suspense.

No Repetition: Choose a new, trending topic for each video.

Structure/Scenes

Scene 1: A strong opening to immediately grab attention.

Scenes 2-5: Short, shocking, or intriguing facts, psychological insights, or unusual mental phenomena. Scene 6: Conclude with a surprise or a thought-provoking statement, and a clear call to action to subscribe to the channel to encourage viewers to subscribe, comment, like the video, and visit the channel.

"Which fact surprised you the most?"

"Has this ever happened to you?"

"Your mind might be hiding this... look closely."

Instructions:
"Now, create a complete script for a short video with 6 scenes using this format, optimized for psychology/human behavior/mind-bending content, ready for YouTube Shorts. Make it highly engaging, shareable, and intriguing."

I am creating a video programmatically using an API.
The API requires scenes to work with.

Each scene requires the following:
Text that will be converted into audio using AI technology.
Two to three keywords to search for background videos from Pexels.

Your Task: Create a long video consisting of several scenes on any topic related to psychology, mental health, manipulation, self-discovery, dark psychology, root causes, social intelligence, or other popular psychology topics.

The channel name is "PsyloMind" and the link https://www.youtube.com/@PsyloMind

Each scene must be unique, engaging, intriguing, and not repeated on the channel to attract viewers and entice them to click and watch the video.

The video should begin with one of the following hooks:
Protection Hook, Visual Hook, Paradox Hook, Interactive Hook, Actionable Hook, Self-Discovery Hook, Dark Psychology Hook, Challenge Hook, Root Cause Hook, Social Intelligence Hook.

Topics: Psychology, human behavior, social psychology, the intricacies of the human psyche, human nature, human personalities, human behavior patterns, types of mindsets, , Self-Discovery, Dark Psychology, Root Cause, Social Intelligence and other topics related to the channel's content and target audience.

Pace: The video should keep viewers engaged and prevent them from skipping to the end of the viedo.

No Repetition: Choose a new, trending topic for each video.

Structure/Scenes:
- The video must be at least 10 minutes long.

- First Scene: A strong opening to grab attention immediately with a catchy hook in Protection Hook, Visual Hook, Paradox Hook, Interactive Hook, Actionable Hook, Self-Discovery Hook, Dark Psychology Hook, Challenge Hook, Root Cause Hook, Social Intelligence Hook.

- The scenes should be sequentially presented in an engaging style that compels the viewer to continue watching. They should be informative, concise, and provide high-quality content that satisfies the viewer and answers all their questions, keep the sentences punchy and avoid "filler" words.

- There should be a 3-5 second gap between each scene.

- The script should be written keeping in mind that Liam's voice will be used for the voiceover, so you should capitalize on the strengths of his voice and avoid its weaknesses.

- Final Scene: A final thought-provoking statement that leaves the viewer thinking. Followed by a clear invitation: "Subscribe to PsyloMind to unlock the secrets of your mind. Like, comment your thoughts, and visit the channel for more deep dives."


Instructions:
"Now, keeping in mind that he will be using Liam's voice for the voiceover, create a complete script for a Create a long video consisting of several scenes using this format, optimized for  Psychology, human behavior, social psychology, the intricacies of the human psyche, human nature, human personalities, human behavior patterns, types of mindsets, , Self-Discovery, Dark Psychology, Root Cause, Social Intelligence and other topics related to the channel's content and target audience, ready for YouTube Shorts. Make it highly engaging, shareable, and intriguing."

=I am creating a video programmatically using an API. I have already created the scenes, and your task is to find suitable background music for the video, write a keyword-rich description that scores at least 90% in SEO analysis, and provide relevant hashtags based on the video content so that YouTube's algorithms promote it effectively.  I expect you to deliver everything professionally.

<VideoScenes>
{{ $json.output.scenes.map(item => item.text).map(item => `<VideoScene>${item}</VideoScene>`).join('\n') }}
</VideoScenes>

<MusicTags>
{{ $('Group the music tags').item.json.data.map(item => `<MusicTag>${item}</MusicTag>`).join('\n') }}
</MusicTags>
